title: 10/29/20 HOUR 2- Chris Mannix
itunes:title: 10/29/20 HOUR 2- Chris Mannix
description:
Chris Mannix talks to Dan about the NBA new season start date. Chris tells Dan that there is legitimate push back from some NBA players and the players union. Chris says players believe that if Lebron James doesn't want to play on Christmas; then the league wont be starting on Christmas.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Chris Mannix talks to Dan about the NBA new season start date. Chris tells Dan that there is legitimate push back from some NBA players and the players union. Chris says players believe that if Lebron James doesn't want to play on Christmas; then the league wont be starting on Christmas.
